  name: "direct_pki_only",
  roles: ["role_for_pki1_direct"],
  rules: {
    all: [
      {
        field: {
          "realm.name": "pki1",
        },
      },

        field: {
          "metadata.pki_delegated_by_user": null,
        },
      },
    ],

  enabled: true,
});
